H0.text: Air is the substance that all living and nonliving material is composed of.

H1.text: Elements are the substances that all living and nonliving material is composed of.

H2.text: Water is the substance that all living and nonliving material is composed of.

H3.text: Soil is all living and nonliving material.

A4.text: Almost all baryonic matter in the universe is composed of elements (among rare exceptions are neutron stars).

A5.text: Air is mostly a mixture of molecular nitrogen and oxygen, though it does contain compounds including carbon dioxide and water, as well as atomic argon, a noble gas which is chemically inert and therefore does not undergo chemical reactions.
